# XALD Project: Study of methylation changes in Age-related cg sites associated with XALD disease  

This book is created to give answer to the following questions:

1. Is there an age-accelerating factor for XALD patients according to the changes in methylation?

2. Which is the methylation mark associated with XALD disease?
